story.text: Jan 3 (Reuters) - HARRIS STEEL GROUP INC. HSG.TO Current Prior Rating Market perform Outperform Price target C$46.25 C$45.00 --The downgrade comes a day after Harris Steel said it has agreed to be acquired by U.S. steelmaker Nucor Corp. (NUE.N). --Raymond James said Nucor's offer appropriately captures the value it associates to the Harris assets but its new price target offers only limited upside from current trading levels. (Reporting by Aditi Samajpati in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - raymond james downgrades harris steel
